member.returns: True if schema is referenced, false otherwise

member.summary: Check if any delivery entities reference the specified schema ID
member.param: The schema ID to check for references
member.returns: True if any delivery entities reference the schema, false otherwise

member.summary: Interface for validating entity references across all entity managers

member.summary: Validate that an entity can be deleted (no references exist)
member.exception: Thrown if entity cannot be deleted due to references or validation service unavailable

member.summary: Validate that an entity can be updated (for future use if needed)
member.exception: Thrown if entity cannot be updated due to references or validation service unavailable

member.exception: Thrown if schema doesn't exist or validation fails
